entries.name: Conflict
PossibilitySet
entries.desc:
A collection of possibility states that share the same dependencies @attr
[Array] dependencies the dependencies for this set of possibilities @attr
[Array] possibilities the possibilities

entries.name: UnwindDetails
entries.desc:
Details of the state to unwind to when a conflict occurs, and the cause of
the unwind @attr [Integer] state_index the index of the state to unwind to
@attr [Object] state_requirement the requirement of the state we're
unwinding to @attr [Array] requirement_tree for the requirement we're
relaxing @attr [Array] conflicting_requirements the requirements that
combined to cause the conflict @attr [Array] requirement_trees for the
conflict @attr [Array] requirements_unwound_to_instead array of unwind
requirements that were chosen over this unwind

entries.name: base
entries.desc: @return [DependencyGraph] the base dependency graph to which dependencies should be 'locked'

entries.name: original_requested
entries.desc: @return [Array] the dependencies that were explicitly required

entries.name: resolver_ui
entries.desc: @return [UI] the UI that knows how to communicate feedback about the resolution process back to the user

entries.name: specification_provider
entries.desc: @return [SpecificationProvider] the provider that knows about dependencies, requirements, specifications, versions, etc.

entries.name: resolve()
entries.desc: Resolves the {#original_requested} dependencies into a full dependency
